category.name: CPD.Bounding Box Update
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CPD_execute_dataset_save_post_action
preference.preference_description: Activates dataset save post action that updates the Positioned Geometry for a Design Component object whenever a dataset of type UGMASTER, UGALTREP or DirectModel is attached to an Item Revision, which is referenced by that Design Component. The update action may modify one or more of the following depending on the information available from the dataset being attached on the Item Revision: * bounding box coordinates * Trueshape Data * Direct Model Data The default value is false, which disables the above action if only appmodel is installed.
